sys_soap_message_function.envelope: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:par="http://www.delphi-tech.com/ows/PartyChangeService" xmlns:par1="http://www.delphi-tech.com/ows/Party"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <par:PartyChangeRequest> <par:UserId>${PartyChangeRequest.UserId}</par:UserId> <par1:Address key="${PartyChangeRequest.Address}"> <par1:AddressNumberId>${Address.AddressNumberId}</par1:AddressNumberId> <par1:ExternalReferenceId>${Address.ExternalReferenceId}</par1:ExternalReferenceId> <par1:LineOne>${Address.LineOne}</par1:LineOne> <par1:LineTwo>${Address.LineTwo}</par1:LineTwo> <par1:LineThree>${Address.LineThree}</par1:LineThree> <par1:CityName>${Address.CityName}</par1:CityName> <par1:CountyCode>${Address.CountyCode}</par1:CountyCode> <par1:StateOrProvinceCode description="${Address.StateOrProvinceCode}">${Address.StateOrProvinceCode}</par1:StateOrProvinceCode> <par1:PostalCode>${Address.PostalCode}</par1:PostalCode> <par1:CountryCode description="${Address.CountryCode}">${Address.CountryCode}</par1:CountryCode> <par1:CountryName>${Address.CountryName}</par1:CountryName> <par1:AttentionName>${Address.AttentionName}</par1:AttentionName> <par1:PostOfficeAddressIndicator description="${Address.PostOfficeAddressIndicator}">${Address.PostOfficeAddressIndicator}</par1:PostOfficeAddressIndicator> </par1:Address> <par1:Organization key="${PartyChangeRequest.Organization}"> <par1:OrganizationNumberId>${Organization.OrganizationNumberId}</par1:OrganizationNumberId> <par1:BasicAddress addressReference="${PartyChangeRequest.Address}" key="${Organization.BasicAddress}"> <par1:PrimaryIndicator description="${BasicAddress.PrimaryIndicator}">${BasicAddress.PrimaryIndicator}</par1:PrimaryIndicator> <par1:FuturePrimaryIndicator description="${BasicAddress.FuturePrimaryIndicator}">${BasicAddress.FuturePrimaryIndicator}</par1:FuturePrimaryIndicator> <par1:AddressTypeCode description="${BasicAddress.AddressTypeCode}">${BasicAddress.AddressTypeCode}</par1:AddressTypeCode> <par1:AddressPeriod> <par1:StartDate>${AddressPeriod.StartDate}</par1:StartDate> <par1:EndDate>${AddressPeriod.EndDate}</par1:EndDate> </par1:AddressPeriod> </par1:BasicAddress> </par1:Organization> <par:DataModificationInformation> <par:ActionCode/> <par:PreviousDataValueDescription> <par1:Address key="${PartyChangeRequest.Address}"> <par1:AddressNumberId>${Address.AddressNumberId}</par1:AddressNumberId> </par1:Address> <par1:Organization key="${PartyChangeRequest.Organization}"> <par1:OrganizationNumberId>${Organization.OrganizationNumberId}</par1:OrganizationNumberId> <par1:BasicAddress addressReference="${PartyChangeRequest.Address}" key="${Organization.BasicAddress}"> </par1:BasicAddress> </par1:Organization> </par:PreviousDataValueDescription> </par:DataModificationInformation> </par:PartyChangeRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
